name: 8 Nights At Garrys
description:
"Have a Garry day!"

Help wanted at the new epic Cakeria (and pizza) after it's previos owner went bankrupt (loser). Fend off animatorincs using epic combo moves and karate as you take on 8 nights to survival! Can you survive all 8 night at GARYY?

Features!:

  • Save System! (seriously it does and I hate it
  • 3 super epic easter eggs to find!
  • Night!
  • Ace jet plane combat scnarios!

PS Larry and corp. is not responsible for any beheadings at the new Cakeria and Pizza
